projects.title: PensionAI - AI-Driven Fintech Platform
projects.description: Built production-grade SaaS platform delivering real-time pension insights with Flutter Web/Mobile frontend and FastAPI backend. Integrated Azure OpenAI for automated analysis
highlights: Developed Flutter Web + Mobile apps with production-grade performance
Built REST APIs with authentication and validation workflows
Designed scalable cloud infrastructure with Docker, NGINX, CI/CD
Integrated external services: Microsoft Graph/Teams, SES, GitHub
Selected for Azure sponsorship at Microsoft as a chosen startup

projects.title: Automated Test Systems (DVASH)
projects.description: Built automated test systems (ATE) combining hardware, firmware, GUI tools and measurement frameworks for production-grade testing

projects.title: System Integration Software (Opsys)
projects.description: Developed software tools for system integration, debugging, and validation of LiDAR systems
highlights: Advanced proficiency in C# and Python
